entry.content:
There is a lot of discussion of the the Russian invasion of Ukraine in a top level thread from a couple of days ago with lots of claims of who thought what and when with only one real objectively verifiable claim referenced (that Russia would control more territory after a certain one month period), so I would like to give everyone an opportunity to make some falsifiable predictions with a percentage of certainty and a date and means to determine if the prediction was accurate.
For example, I believe that their is a 35% chance that Russia totally controls either Slovyansk or Bakhmut by September 21, 2022, as assessed by the Institute for the Study of War at understandingwar.org.
Anyone else?
